titles.title: A bill to establish a tax on short-term capital gains, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a 100 percent short-term capital gains tax on gain from any stocks, options, or futures that are held by an individual or corporate taxpayer for less than one year.
